A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The 1st movie I saw in a theater was Episode IV in 1977\, I was six. The Last Jedi is probably right alongside Empire Strikes Back as my favorite. I loved this movie and all of the risks that it took\, the pay off for me was astounding. I know a lot of people get caught up in vaugeries of cannon and the details of being a Star Wars fan\, but if you go in just wanting to see a great Star Wars movie I don't see how you can go wrong with this film. It's popcorn action\, laughs and a few tears mixed in\, basically what we go to movies for. Well done to all involved.
